scripts.postinstall: yarn run --silent prepare:arbitrum && yarn run --silent codegen
scripts.test: yarn run --silent test:lint && yarn run --silent test:graph
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: mustache config/arbitrum.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/arbitrum.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:optimism: mustache config/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/optimism.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.publish:arbitrum:0xgraph: 0xgraph remove beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum && sleep 10 && 0xgraph create beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum && yarn --silent codegen && 0xgraph build && sleep 5 && 0xgraph deploy beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum --version-label=v0.0.1
scripts.publish:optimism:0xgraph: 0xgraph remove beefyfinance/clm-optimism && sleep 10 && 0xgraph create beefyfinance/clm-optimism && yarn --silent codegen && 0xgraph build && sleep 5 && 0xgraph deploy beefyfinance/clm-optimism --version-label=v0.0.1
scripts.publish:arbitrum:goldsky: yarn codegen && yarn build && goldsky subgraph delete beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum/0.0.1 && goldsky subgraph deploy beefyfinance/clm-arbitrum/0.0.1 --path .
scripts.publish:optimism:goldsky: yarn codegen && yarn build && goldsky subgraph delete beefyfinance/clm-optimism/0.0.1 && goldsky subgraph deploy beefyfinance/clm-optimism/0.0.1 --path .
